import PropTypes from '../../components/PropTypes';
import Theme from '../../components/Theme';
import { InlineBlock } from 'fannypack/InlineBlock/InlineBlock';

# InlineBlock

```js
import { InlineBlock } from 'fannypack';
```

By default it renders a `<Box>` component with `display: inline-block`.

```jsx-live
<InlineBlock>This is an inline block</InlineBlock>
```

## InlineBlock Props

```
{ base?: any; }
```

## Theming

<Theme component={InlineBlock} overrides={['InlineBlock.base']}>This is an inline block</Theme>
